sentences.english: It appears as a line in the profit and loss statement.
sentences.chinese: 它以损益表上的一行项目出现。

sentences.english: We’ve talked about the Income Statement and the Balance Sheet.
sentences.chinese: 我们已经谈了损益表和资产负债表。

sentences.english: A P&L can only tell you so much about a business.
sentences.chinese: 一张损益表可以告诉你一家企业的很多情况。

sentences.english: The income statement account usually want to be reflect by their monthly total or by the year-to-date.
sentences.chinese: 损益表账户通常反映月份合计或年初至今的信息。

sentences.english: I almost never look at a profit and loss statement without also looking at a balance sheet.
sentences.chinese: 我几乎从来不会甩开资产负债表而单独地看损益表。

sentences.english: That’s what the income statement is designed to reveal.
sentences.chinese: 损益表的设计，用以揭示的正是盈利能力。

sentences.english: The analysis on it should base on the accruals and matching conceptions.
sentences.chinese: 用损益表进行分析时要注意权责发生制和配比原则。

sentences.english: The presentation Google uses is quite common.
sentences.chinese: 谷歌的损益表采用了普通的列报方式。

sentences.english: The practice of inappropriately misconstruing income statements for the purpose of pleasing investors and inflating stock prices.
sentences.chinese: 不当地编制损益表以取悦投资者及提高股价。

sentences.english: That will create a large one time expense on your profit and loss statement.
sentences.chinese: 那将在损益表上形成一次性高额费用。
